circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Tina was last known to be living with an acquaintance in Clearfield, UT for a few days. She was known to have been living a transient lifestyle. Based on the acquaintance's testimony and surveillance footage, she was last seen walking away from the acquaintance's apartment. She left behind multiple suitcases full of clothing and her cell phone. She had been asking multiple people for money so she could travel to St. George, UT. She was last seen wearing a dark-colored shirt, dark-colored pants, and carrying a white wallet. It was reported that she did not have any scars, marks, or tattoos on her body.

On September 4th, 1940 Lynn V. Simmons was a part of a geological survey team working on Lamotte Peak at about 12,700 ft when a storm hit at about 2 pm. Simmons and his three coworkers began head for spike camp, established on the head of boundary peak. Simmons lagged behind the others. He was last seen as he came down the saddle of Lamotte peak on a long, rocky ridge to Bald Ridge (about half a mile from the peak). His coworkers waved to him and he waved back. He was never seen again. Several storms in the following days/weeks dropped 6 to 8 inches snow and hindered search efforts.
Adam Brixey was last seen on 09/20/2015 at an abandoned building set for demolition at 26th Street and Adams Avenue in Ogden.
Jordan Gonzales, aka JGo, is missing out of Salt Lake City, Utah. Jordan was last seen in March 2024.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
On November 20, 1934, Everett Ruess set out alone into the Utah desert, taking two donkeys as pack animals. He was never seen again. Earlier in 1934, Ruess had told his parents he would be unreachable for nearly two months, but about three months after his last correspondence, they started receiving their son’s uncalled-for mail. They wrote a letter to the post office of Escalante, Utah, on February 7, 1935. A commissioner of Garfield County saw the letter and decided to form a search party with other men in the area. Ruess’ donkeys were found near the north side of Davis Gulch, a canyon of the Escalante River. The only sign of Ruess himself was a corral he had made at his campsite in Davis Gulch, as well as an inscription the search party found nearby, with the words “NEMO Nov 1934”. The commissioner reported the discovery of the donkeys and the inscription to Ruess’ parents in a letter dated March 8, 1935. 

On March 15, after completing a last attempt to find Ruess in the Kaiparowits Plateau, Allen wrote a final note to the family calling an end to the search efforts. Later searches in late May and June 1935 included an aerial survey of the land from an altitude of 12,000 feet (3,700 m), covering the ground from Lee’s Ferry to Escalante. On the ground, a party of nine horseback riders joined the search, but discontinued their effort a week later. Some believe Ruess may have fallen off a cliff or drowned in a flash flood; others suspected he had been murdered.

This was the last time Mr. Russell was seen.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Thomas "Tommy" Novak was last seen about 10 pm on July 25th, 1958 on the Lawrence Carter Ranch in Park Valley, Utah wearing a tan shirt and blue jeans. No cars or horses were reported missing, so it is assumed the boy left on foot. He did not take any extra clothing or food with him. At first it was thought the boy may be headed to Finley, Nevada or Idaho. A boy resembling Tommy had been seen trying to broad a train at Brigham City.

On Aug 4th, a boy in a tan shirt, blue slacks, a western style straw hat, carrying an old type .22 and a bundle of cattails was seen at the Ogden stockyard and later the rail yards. The boy told a railroad
checker that he was going to Wells, Nevada. The last possible sighting of Tommy came from a rancher in Snowville, Utah who reported that he saw the boy on the evening of Aug 11th. The Box Elder County Sheriff's Office, led by Sheriff Warren Hyde, and many locals on horseback conducted extensive searches of the rugged area around Park Valley but did not find any trace of the missing boy. Railroad authorities as far as California were notified to be on the look out for Tommy riding the rails. 

Before moving to Utah about a year prior, the family had lived in Nevada. The authorities from Nevada were familiar with Tommy and noted that the boy had an interest in trucks. He was known to hitch
rides or stow-away in large trucks. Tommy had one sibling, a four-year-old brother, at the time of his disappearance.

notes.description: Tommy was not reported missing until until July 29th since he had run away from home several times before but never stayed away too long.

clothingAndAccessoriesArticles.description: Last seen wearing a tan shirt and blue jeans; possibly a western style straw hat, an old type .22 rifle, and a bundle of cattails.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: On 12/17/2007 Jose Falcon was reported to the Sheriff's Office as a Missing Person. His girlfriend reported he was gone when she returned home, with no indication  where he had gone. He left his home in Winchester Hills driving his Gold Saturn car. The vehicle was later located unoccupied in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Fernando was last seen exercising with boys from his group home. He is from Honduras and may have gone there. He speaks no English.

clothingAndAccessoriesArticles.description: He was last seen wearing a brown t-shirt and black athletic shoes.

He had not seen or had contact with her since 2012. The sibling suspected she may have been relocated to a religious colony in North Dakota.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Edgar was last seen on November 17, 2020 at his residence located in Salt Lake City.  Edgar is originally from Guatemala and speaks Mayan and Spanish. He is not familiar with the Salt Lake City area.  Edgar is known to wear the Pennywise flat brim hat and may be wearing a black leather jacket.
Sacramento was last seen by his mother in 2019. His last known location and contact was in Provo, UT on 9/7/2021.

On March 24, 2022 Yojaira Perez Chun was reported as a runaway with the West Valley City Police Department. Yojaira is from Guatamala and came into the states to live with a distant family member. Yojaira was only in the United States for approximately one week before leaving her living arrangements and blocked her distant family member on all social media and her phone. Yojaira was reported to have runaway with a potential cousin who has not been confirmed. Yojaira has not been located or heard of since the reported incident. it is possible yojaira may have been spotted in Minnesota with a boyfriend or an unknown male.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Robert went missing back in 1986 and several days later his motorcycle was located in the Highlands of Mountain Green. According to Lugo's mother, he told her he was going backpacking in Mountain Green on a Wednesday and was supposed to be back that same Friday. Contact was made with the mother after his motorcycle was found by a local resident. A fairly large search was conducted including rescue dogs, airplanes and helicopters and several hundred people. No sign of Lugo was ever located.

Martin Andrew Smith, of California, was camping in a Dry Wash off the Hole in the Rock road. His belongings had been there for a long time. His vehicle was taken and camp still put together. Last receipt was for November 27, 2017. Some more of Martin's belongings were turned in including 2 guns and ammunition in a canvas bag.

vehicles.comment: Garfield County Sheriff's Office located the vehicle in the wash and took possession of it

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Gilberto came to Utah from California and stayed at a hotel in Springville, UT for a night or two. JACOB PETTY (MP94494) AND HIS BROTHER JOSHUA PETTY LEFT FARMINGTON HILLS, MICHIGAN WITH A FRIEND HEADED TO LAS VEGAS, NEVADA. THE FRIENDS VEHICLE WAS STOPPED IN BEAVER COUNTY, UTAH ON 5/8/22 AT 1300 HRS. THE DEPUTY IDENTIFIED THE DRIVER AND IDENTIFIED THE TWO JUVENILE PASSENGERS AS JACOB AND JOSHUA PETTY. THE DEPUTY ADVISED THE VEHICLE WAS TRAVELING ON A FREEWAY THAT LEADS TO LAS VEGAS, THROUGH THE INVESTIGATION, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT JACOB AND JOSHUA HAVE FAMILY IN LAS VEGAS. CONTACT HAS NOT BEEN MADE WITH EITHER BOY SINCE THE TRAFFIC STOP AND FAMILY HAS STATED THE BOYS ARE NOT WITH THEM. FRIEND AND HIS VEHICLE HAVE SINCE RETURNED TO FARMINGTON HILLS.

Justin was last seen by a gas station worker in Salem, KY on December 21st or 22nd of 2023. The vehicle he was driving was found abandoned at a national forest in Duchesne County, Utah.
Justin's bank records and phone records were obtained, but did not show anything. The search and rescue team as well as law enforcement in Duchesne County completed a search of the area to no avail.

Treye rented a vehicle in Minnesota to visit family in Salt Lake City, Utah.  He left Utah on 02/11/2023 and was believed to be driving back to Minnesota.  He is believed to have left the country and travelled to Japan based on social media posts.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Sahil was last seen leaving work on 1/20/23 and failed to report to work for several days after. Associates have been unable to reach him since.

Jamey was last seen in La Sal, Utah on April 15, 2022 leaving a local property with his pedal bike.  Jamey has not been heard from or seen since that date.  We believe that Jamey was experiencing homelessness at the time of his disappearance.

On May 1, 2015 Deborah Carver's brother called to report there had been no contact with Deborah since April 28, 2015.  Deborah's phone, purse and personal affects were all found inside her apartment.  Deborah's vehicle was also left in the parking lot of her apartment.  Nobody had seen her leave the apartment and there was no information to indicate where she had gone or who she may have been with.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Kandis was last seen on July 15, 2021, in Salt Lake City, Utah. She was last seen with her hair dyed dark brown. She reportedly spends time around Liberty Park and in the areas around North Temple and State Street. She may possibly be with an older adult male. She has a medical condition that requires constant medication. Any information, call 801-799-3000

On 5/20/1946, Frances Taylor (Shurtleff) Sessions, her son, and her nephew,  were visiting Frances’ father who was farming in the 100 Block above Harrison in Ogden, Utah. At approximately 2:00 p.m. Frances and the two boys went on a hike straight east from the farm to Bear Cave. As they were hiking, they got into loose shale and began sliding. Frances, who was sliding herself tried to grab the boys but was unable and the boys fell over some cliffs. Frances was able to carry her son down the mountain but he died while she was carrying him. The other boy was able to walk part of the way down where he was picked up by Frances'

Her nephew was taken to the hospital and survived. At 4:00 p.m., two hours after her 6-year-old son passed, Frances disappeared from her parent’s home. A missing person report was made reporting she left her father’s home in Ogden. The Ogden Police investigators pursued numerous leads across the United States, but Frances has never been located and remains a missing person.

notes.description: There has been a story done on Cutis Crosby's missing status on the local news in Salt Lake City in February 2015. He is well known in the community for his advocacy with the Hurricane Katrina evacuees, feeding the homeless and has been featured in new stories, parades and other events centered around the Hurricane Katrina evacuees that have settled in the Salt Lake City area. His disappearance is very concerning and very unlike him. We feel that he needs medical treatment and would just like to find him and get him the proper care.
